mapper.select: SELECT A.timetable_id timetableId , B.start_time startTime , B.end_time endTime , C.title itemTitle , D.seat_id seatId , E.seat_name seatName , B.price itemPrice FROM TN_tk_CART A , TN_tk_TIMETABLE B , TN_tk_item C , TN_tk_RESERVED_SEATS D , TN_tk_SEAT E WHERE A.timetable_id = B.timetable_id AND B.item_id = C.item_id AND B.timetable_id = D.timetable_id AND A.SEAT_ID = D.SEAT_ID AND D.seat_id = E.seat_id AND A.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY A.created_at
